content: chain loop through to the back of the window and work double_crochet like normal complete the stitch through the back of the window *chain 1 skip 1 chain double_crochet through next window* 23 times double_crochet in front of color a foundation row in the last stitch chain 4 turn 26 double_crochet 25 windows made page | 4 note your work is now interlocked and you will follow the pattern of filet crochet double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet to end of row from here forward double_crochet s and chains will not be indicated from this point forward as they are implied the only thing that will change is if you crochet in front or back of the previous row in the opposite color this is indicated in the rest of the pattern with f for front and b for back the number of double_crochet s in the front or back are before the f or b ex 3b = *1 double_crochet chain 1 skip 1* 3 times behind previous row the wrong side is indicated by italics you will always complete two row before turning click here for video overview row 3 - wrong side color a color b tail hanging in back os 1b 23f 1b os chain 4 do not turn row 4 - wrong side color b sb 2b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b sb chain 4 turn page | 5 row 5 - right side color a color b tail hanging in front os 25f os chain 4 do not turn row 6 - right side color b sf 2f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f 1b 1f sf chain 4 turn row 7 - wrong side color a color b tail hanging in back os 1b 23f 1b os chain 4 do not turn row 8 - wrong side color b sb 6b 3f 2b 2f 2b 3f 6b sb chain 4 turn row 9 - right side color a color b tail hanging in front os 1f 5b 4f 1b 3f 1b 4f 5b 1f os chain 4 do not turn row 10 - right side color b sf 6f 3b 1f 4b 1f 3b 6f sf chain 4 turn row 11 - wrong side color a color b tail hanging in back os 1b 6f 2b 1f 2b 1f 4b 7f 1b os chain 4 do not turn row 12 - wrong side color b sb 7b 1f 2b 1f 2b 1f 1b 1f 8b sb chain 4 turn row 13 - right side color a color b tail hanging in front os 1f 7b 2f 3b 2f 1b 2f 6b 1f os chain 4 do not turn row 14 - right side color b sf 6f 3b 4f 1b 2f 1b 7f sf chain 4 turn page | 6 row 15
